channel.title: No fighting in PVP, LOL!
channel.description:
Hey, here's my issue.
I have this 517 client, named Abbyscap3, I'm sure it's familiar to most of you guys, however, here's my problem...
In PVP or BH or anywhere in the wilderness, there is no attack option. I can only use magic on people, but, not melee or range. Does anyone know how to add the attack option so people can actually fight via melee and range?

item.title: No fighting in PVP, LOL!
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

Can you guys stop posting stuff that’s not going to help me, please?

Read full topic

Okay…well…that really didn’t help me at all, but, thanks anyways.

item.title: No fighting in PVP, LOL!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

I[quote=“Eric E., post:1, topic:324679”]Hey, here’s my issue.

I have this 517 client, named Abbyscap3, I’m sure it’s familiar to most of you guys, however, here’s my problem…

In PVP or BH or anywhere in the wilderness, there is no attack option. I can only use magic on people, but, not melee or range. Does anyone know how to add the attack option so people can actually fight via melee and range?[/quote]

I don’t think there is such things as a ‘517’, IMO it’s just a 508 loading 525 cache.

Read full topic
